src:
成荣集团公布新大股东
01 Nov 2019, 07:24 by Chong Jin Hun
（吉隆坡1日讯）成荣集团（Mudajaya Group Bhd）表示，Yakin Setiamas私人有限公司周二（10月29日）收购了成荣集团的1亿6233万股或27.52%股权后，崛起为其大股东。
成荣集团今日向大马交易所报备，Ample Full Profits Ltd持有Yakin Setiamas的90%股权，Chamber Jewels Ltd则持有剩余的10%股权。
成荣集团说：“Chamber Jewels的股东是James Wong Tet Foh及Lee Eng Leong，各持50%股权。”
成荣集团在另一份文告中表示，Dataran Sentral（马）私人有限公司周二脱售了成荣集团的直接与间接股权（1亿6233万股）后，不再是其大股东。
成荣集团表示，Dataran Sentral不再是其大股东，因为“Dataran Sentral脱售了股票”及“Kingsman Capital Ltd脱售了股票”。
Kingsman周二脱售了成荣集团的5241万股，不再是后者的大股东。
截至下午2点59分，成荣集团报35.5仙，跌0.5仙或1.39%，约1888万2200股转手。
（编译：魏素雯）

English version：Mudajaya reveals new major shareholder

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Chengrong Group Announces New Major Shareholders
01 Nov 2019, 07:24 by Chong Jin Hun
KUALA LUMPUR (April 1): Yakinj Group Bhd said that Yakin Setiamas Sdn Bhd rose to its major shareholder after acquiring 12,623,300 shares or 27.52% of Chengrong Group on Tuesday (October 29). .
Chengrong Group reported to the Bursa Malaysia today that Ample Full Profits Ltd holds a 90% stake in Yakin Setiamas and Chamber Jewels Ltd holds the remaining 10%.
Chengrong Group said: "The shareholders of Chamber Jewels are James Wong Tet Foh and Lee Eng Leong, each holding 50% of the shares."
Chengrong Group said in another statement that Dataran Sentral (M) Sdn Bhd was no longer its major shareholder after it sold off its direct and indirect equity (160.23 million shares) on Tuesday.
Chengrong Group said that Dataran Sentral is no longer its major shareholder because “Dataran Sentral sold off the stock” and “Kingsman Capital Ltd sold the stock”.
Kingsman sold 52.41 million shares of Chengrong Group on Tuesday, no longer the majority shareholder of the latter.
As of 2:59 pm, Chengrong Group reported 35.5 sen, down 0.5 sen or 1.39%, and about 18.88 million 2200 shares changed hands.
(Compile: Wei Suwen)

English version:Mudajaya reveals new major shareholder

Via theedgemarkets.com
